蓋う: (おおう) - to cover; to hide; to conceal; to wrap; to disguise
蓋を閉める: (ふたをしめる) - (ant: 蓋を開ける・1) to shut the lid
蓋を開ける: (ふたをあける) - (ant: 蓋を閉める) to open the lid/to lift a lid; to open the lid (on)/to make public; to start (something); to look at the results (consequences, outcome, effect)/to look at the condition of something; to open (of a theatre)
蓋付き: (ふたつき) - having a lid or cover; container having a lid
蓋物: (ふたもの) - lidded pottery or receptacle
蓋置き: (ふたおき) - rest for the lid of a teakettle (tea ceremony)
蓍木: (めどぎ) - Chinese lespedeza (species of bush clover, Lespedeza cuneata)
蓍萩: (メドハギ) - Chinese lespedeza (species of bush clover, Lespedeza cuneata)
蓐草: (じょくそう) - straw or hay (layed out in barns for livestock)
蓑: (さ) - Capa de chuva de palha, capa de chuva de palha
蓑亀: (みのがめ) - old turtle with seaweed growing on its back
蓑笠: (さりゅう) - sedge hat and straw rain cape
蓚酸カルシウム: (しゅうさんカルシウム) - calcium oxalate
蓚酸ナトリウム: (しゅうさんナトリウム) - sodium oxalate
蓬: (ほう) - Sagebrush , Japanese mugwort (Artemísia princeps, Artemísia indica var. maximowiczii); plants in the Artemisia genus, mugwort, sagebrush, wormwood
蓬が島: (よもぎがしま) - Mount Penglai; Japan
蓬属: (よもぎぞく) - Artemisia (genus of a between 200 to 400 species of plants in the daisy family Asteraceae)
蓬生: (よもぎう) - wasteland; area overgrown with weeds
蓬窓: (ほうそう) - window with a view of a Japanese mugwort thicket; poor house/humble house/primitive house
蓬莱: (ほうらい) - Mount Penglai/Penglai Island/enchanted land of perpetual youth from Chinese mythology; sacred mountain (e.g. Mount Fuji, Mount Kumano, etc.); Kansai New Year decoration (made from food); Formosa/Taiwan
蓬莱竹: (ホウライチク) - hedge bamboo (Bambusa multiplex); golden goddess bamboo
蓬莱羊歯: (ホウライシダ) - common maidenhair (species of maidenhair fern, Adiantum capillus-veneris)
蓬莱飾: (ほうらいかざり) - Kansai New Year decoration (made from food)
蓬莱飾り: (ほうらいかざり) - Kansai New Year decoration (made from food)
蓬莱鱛: (ホウライエソ) - Sloane's viperfish (Chauliodus sloani)
蓬頭垢面: (ほうとうこうめん) - (yoji) (with) unkempt hair and dirty face; being indifferent to one's personal appearance
蓬餅: (よもぎもち) - rice-flour dumplings mixed with mugwort
蓬髪: (ほうはつ) - unkempt hair; disheveled hair; tousled hair
蓮: (れん) - Lotus , sacred lotus (Loto aquático), Indian lotus, lotus; rose of Sharon (Hibiscus syriacus)
蓮台: (れんだい) - lotus-shaped pedestal for images of the Buddha
蓮月尼: (れんげつに) - name of a famous Buddhist nun
蓮根掘る: (はすねほる) - to dig up lotus roots
蓮芋: (ハスイモ) - giant elephant ear (species of taro, Colocasia gigantea)
蓮花: (レンゲ) - lotus flower; Chinese milk vetch (Astragalus sinicus); china spoon; lotus-shaped pedestal for a gravestone
蓮華: (レンゲ) - lotus flower; Chinese milk vetch (Astragalus sinicus); china spoon; lotus-shaped pedestal for a gravestone
蓮華升麻: (レンゲショウマ) - false anemone (Anemonopsis macrophylla)
蓮華座: (れんげざ) - lotus seat (under Buddha's statue)
蓮華草: (れんげそう) - Chinese milk vetch (Astragalus sinicus)
蓮華躑躅: (レンゲツツジ) - Japanese azalea (Rhododendron japonicum); renge azalea
蓮見白: (はすみしろ) - hasumijiro camelia; hasumishiro camelia; Camellia japonica var.
蓮角: (レンカク) - jacana (esp. the pheasant-tailed jacana, Hydrophasianus chirurgus); lily-trotter
蓼: (しん) - Luxurious Grass , knotweed (Poligonáceas), jointweed, smartweed; water pepper (Persicaria hydropiper)
蓼科: (たでか) - Polygonaceae; knotweed or smartweed family of plants
蓼藍: (タデアイ) - dyer's knotweed (Persicaria tinctoria, used to produce indigo dye)
蓼酢: (たでず) - water pepper vinegar; vinegar infused and mixed with water pepper leaves, esp. served with salt-grilled sweetfish
蓼食う虫も好き好き: (たでくうむしもすきずき) - some prefer nettles; there's no accounting for taste; every man to his taste
蔀戸: (しとみど) - {archit} latticed shutters (in traditional Japanese and Chinese architecture)
蔑する: (なみする) - to set at naught; to ignore; to disregard
蔑む: (さげすむ) - to scorn; to despise; to hold in contempt; to look down on; to disdain
蔑ろにする: (ないがしろにする) - to make light of; to ignore; to slight
蔑称: (べっしょう) - disparaging words; derogatory term; insult; epithet
蔓: (まん) - Videira, videira, bine, gavinete, estolão; arco, haste da armação, peça lateral, braço do encaixe, haste da orelha; conexões, contatos, influência, apoiador financeiro
蔓延: (まんえん) - spread (e.g. of a disease); rampancy; infestation; proliferation; being widespread
蔓延る: (はびこる) - to spread; to run rampant; to infest; to grow thick; to become powerful
